statements: DELETE FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE organizer = 'ABC Media';
DELETE FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE organizer = 'Media Company' AND budget < 5000.00;
DELETE FROM media_literacy_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND target_audience = 'Students';
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Engagement' AND metric_value > 100.5;
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1,2);
DELETE FROM campaign_engagement WHERE engagement_date < '2022-01-01' AND engagement_type = 'click' AND participant_id = 3;
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND metric_value > 1000;
